product_name: AlpineAire Chicken and Almond Salad with Crackers - 2 Servings - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Chicken and Almond Salad offers 2 delicious servings of a moist salad mix of chicken, sliced almonds, onion, carrots, celery, sour cream powder and spices to top the included Pilot Biscuit crackers.
short_description: Chicken and Almond Salad offers 2 delicious servings of a moist salad mix of chicken, sliced almonds, onion, carrots, celery, sour cream powder and spices to top the included Pilot Biscuit crackers.
